Author: chassischuck
Text: Topomax made colors brighter but made soda taste funny actually anything carbonated lol   But it makes the world a bit more fluffy softer I guess would be a better word   It makes certain foods taste different or did for me like processed food but it didnt like suppress hunger or .ake it easy to not eat it actually made me pretty hungry just not for junk food

Author: LikeaPandaButUgly
Text: Main problem for me is that it can reduce appetite and make food taste “dull”. I don’t think it made me feel full faster or anything though, so hopefully the side effects won’t derail you. It does help with my headaches though.
